question_stem:
Question 2 (correct answer in yellow highlight)
The leaf node in the square (no 1763/1942) means

Among 1789 customers saying “no” to the subscription of the bank service, the probability that they belong to poutcome = failure, other or unknown is 1763/1942.

Among all the 2000 customers, there are 1942 of them has poutcome = failure, other or unknown. Among those 1942 customers, 1763 of them did not subscribe the bank service.
